messages.msgSnippet: You are so right and great idea!  We did talk about how some people don t understand respecting nature and that other people do think differently about
messages.messageBody:
You are so right and great idea! We did talk about how some people
don't understand respecting nature and that other people "do" think
differently about things.

Thanks for your thoughts!

~A
